ray.rage.scene

Interface AmbientLight

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable, Managed<SceneManager>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericAmbientLight

    public interface AmbientLight
extends Managed<SceneManager>, Disposable
    An ambient light provides global, and evenly-distributed, illumination for an entire scene.

    An ambient light is not a scene-object, has no position, direction, or attenuation/falloff. Instead, it simulates the indirect light that has already bounced around an entire scene and illuminated everything in it evenly.

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
